H0.text: The offspring will be genetically identical to the parent plant when a fern reproduces with spores.

H1.text: The offspring will be better able to adapt to the environment when a fern reproduces with spores.

H2.text: The offspring of a fern that reproduces with spores will have half the genetic material of the parent plant.

H3.text: Will have twice the genetic materials of the parent plant is what the offspring of a fern have when it reproduces with spores.
